user.title: Connect to Seam API
user.description:
Enter your Seam API key from [console.seam.co](https://console.seam.co).

Your Schlage account must already be linked in the Seam Console.

select_device.title: Select Lock
select_device.description: Choose the lock to add. The name from the Seam API will be used as the initial device name in Home Assistant. You can rename it later in Settings > Devices.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to Seam API. Check your API key.
error.no_devices: No locks found. Link your Schlage account in the Seam Console first.

init.title: Seam Lock Options
init.description: Configure polling and webhook settings. The webhook URL is shown as a persistent notification after setup.
